凹凸图可以用于展示多组数值变化情况。

## 环境配置

-   系统: Cross-platform (Linux/MacOS/Windows)

-   编程语言: R

-   依赖包: `data.table`; `jsonlite`; `ggplot2`; `ggbump`; `dplyr`

```{r packages setup, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, output=FALSE}
# 安装包
if (!requireNamespace("data.table", quietly = TRUE)) {
  install.packages("data.table")
}
if (!requireNamespace("jsonlite", quietly = TRUE)) {
  install.packages("jsonlite")
}
if (!requireNamespace("ggplot2", quietly = TRUE)) {
  install.packages("ggplot2")
}
if (!requireNamespace("ggbump", quietly = TRUE)) {
  install.packages("ggbump")
}
if (!requireNamespace("dplyr", quietly = TRUE)) {
  install.packages("dplyr")
}

# 加载包
library(data.table)
library(jsonlite)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggbump)
library(dplyr)
```

## 数据准备

```{r load data, message=FALSE}
# 加载数据
data <- data.table::fread(jsonlite::read_json("https://hiplot.cn/ui/basic/bumpchart/data.json")$exampleData$textarea[[1]])
data <- as.data.frame(data)

# 查看数据
head(data)
```

## 可视化

```{r fig-1Bumpchart}
#| label: fig-1Bumpchart
#| fig-cap: "凹凸图"
#| out.width: "95%"
#| fig-height: 4
#| fig-width: 6
#| warning: false

# 凹凸图
p <- ggplot(data, aes(x = x, y = y, color = group)) +
  geom_bump(size = 1.5) +
  geom_point(size = 5) +
  geom_text(data = data %>% filter(x == min(x)),
            aes(x = x - 0.1, label = group),
            size = 5, hjust = 1) +
  geom_text(data = data %>% filter(x == max(x)),
            aes(x = x + 0.1, label = group),
            size = 5, hjust = 0) +
  theme_void() +
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#0571B0","#92C5DE","#F4A582","#CA0020"))

p
```
